displayName: MCP Server for Singapore Government Open Data
description: Provide seamless access to open datasets and collections from data.gov.sg. Enable searching, metadata retrieval, and filtered dataset downloads for analysis.

capabilities.name: datagovsg_get_collection
capabilities.description: Get metadata for a specific data.gov.sg collection

capabilities.name: datagovsg_get_dataset_metadata
capabilities.description: Get metadata for a specific data.gov.sg dataset

capabilities.name: datagovsg_search_dataset
capabilities.description: Search for data within a data.gov.sg dataset

capabilities.name: datagovsg_initiate_download
capabilities.description: Initiate download of a data.gov.sg dataset with optional filtering

capabilities.name: datagovsg_poll_download
capabilities.description: Check data.gov.sg download status and get download URL

capabilities.name: singstat_search_resources
capabilities.description: Search for SingStat tables by keyword (works best with single words)

capabilities.name: singstat_get_metadata
capabilities.description: Get metadata for a specific SingStat table

capabilities.name: singstat_get_table_data
capabilities.description: Get data from a specific SingStat table with optional filtering
